column4: Why won't this sed line work?  The regex works with egrep as expected.   sed 's/<title\b[^>] *>(.*?)<\/title>/this is what I want it to say/g' index.html
the title tag, I escaped the / in title?  I also tried it with sed 's!<title\b[^>] *>(.*?)</title>!this is what I want it to say!g' index.html
